thread.title: A very good locations for shopping and dinning
thread.title_full: A very good locations for shopping and dinning - Review of Le Placide, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: samanvia
title: A very good locations for shopping and dinning
text:
Very friendly stuffs and very convenient location for shopping and eating.
The le bon merche department store just right about the conner. You could buy luxury brands and premier foods from their supermarket. Easy to do tax refund and ppls there are nice and helpful.
The area is a little posh and it has noise free environment. We have a good night while staying at the hotel.
